subject: College Athletics
lead_paragraph: Courtney Barg scored in the 15th minute and Notre Dame beat Stanford, 1-0, on Friday to reach the championship of the women’s College Cup in Cary, N.C. The Fighting Irish (26-0-0), who are in the final four for the third straight year, advanced to play North Carolina (24-1-2), which defeated U.C.L.A. by 1-0, on Sunday.
